items.sentence: Tom hesitated to discuss the subject with Mary.
Tom hid behind the curtain and held his breath.
There\'s a mailbox somewhere along this street.
There\'s a storage space underneath the stairs.
Tom saw Mary waiting in front of the warehouse.
Tom says he was in Boston the week before last.
I can\'t believe that Tom really said no to me.
I can\'t believe you actually got into Harvard.
I can\'t think of any solution to this problem.
I can\'t wait to see you guys again in October.
